name: Pitch Black Plinko
description:
Pitch Black Plinko

Play Plinko in a unique way - everything is pitch black, and gets illuminated when coming into contact with the ball. Hit the pegs, beat the high scores, and relax to some low-effort gameplay with lo-fi beats.

Currently contains 10 levels.

All Lo-Fi beats are Royalty Free found from various artists on YouTube. The rest of the game is made by me.
